title: PL
text:
Paul Lafourcade


PhD, Research Engineer


LMCE, Bruyères-le-Châtel, France




I am a computational physicist specializing in the mechanical response of crystalline materials under extreme conditions, including high strain rates and shock loading. I am currently a researcher at the Laboratory for Matter in Extreme Conditions (LMCE), a CEA entity located in Bruyères-le-Châtel, France.
A significant part of my current work is devoted to the development of the open-source molecular dynamics (MD) code exaStamp, available on GitHub , along with its corresponding documentation .



Work in progress..

title: PL
text:
I am a computational physicist specializing in the mechanical response of crystalline materials under extreme conditions, including high strain rates and shock loading. I am currently a researcher at the Laboratory for Matter in Extreme Conditions (LMCE), a CEA entity located in Bruyères-le-Châtel, France.
A significant part of my current work is devoted to the development of the open-source molecular dynamics (MD) code exaStamp, available on GitHub , along with its corresponding documentation .
